Text: Thank you very much dear sir. Looking forward to a quick upload of the F1 India GP on Sunday :)
Thanks alot again. This time you were quick. Hope next year that the Sky coverage will be as good as the BBC.
May you be blessed with a thousand children Jorrell!! Keep uploading F1 mate, your a bloody champ!!

You just made my weekend a whole lot better!

Just a question, this Sky Sports coverage you are going to offer us for the remainder of the races, is this the same content as BBC or do they have their own hosts and stuff?

You're a legend! *bows*
Fastest on this session: the stray dog running on the track!
